feed.title: Google Cloud: Tools for PowerShell
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Tools for PowerShell

entry.content: Effective immediately, Cloud Tools for PowerShell is deprecated and can no longer be installed using the Google Cloud CLI. For more information, see Cloud Tools for PowerShell deprecation.
entry.summary: Cloud Tools for PowerShell has been deprecated and is no longer available for installation via the Google Cloud CLI. For further details, please refer to the deprecation notice.
entry.title: Deprecated: Cloud Tools for PowerShell Deprecated
